attributes.action: Ensure that money for Sexual Health and HIV services are used by trusts for those services only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that money provided for Sexual Health and HIV services in Primary care and Hospital Trusts are used for that and not used to help pay deficeits in other services.
The reasons that HIV and STIs are on the increase and that Money that is provided for Health Prevention and the Diagnosis and treatment of HIV and Sexual Health Infections need to be Protected (Ring fenced) until the services are at level at which GUM/HIV clinics can deal with people attending the clinics and we see a decrease in infections.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure that money for Sexual Health and HIV services are used by trusts for those services only."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16592


Prime Minister's Office
